channel.title: Spec help! need 1337 leet help! someone good plz!

item.title: Spec help! need 1337 leet help! someone good plz!
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

My code has it as…

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; npcDamage(8); }

and then there is also…

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(100); usingSpecial = true; }

Try that. There are two places to put them, the first one I showed you should go in the second place.

Read full topic
item.source: Spec help! need 1337 leet help! someone good plz!

item.title: Spec help! need 1337 leet help! someone good plz!
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

I would try pasting this under specdelay -= 3
1 or 2 more times
SpecDamg(34);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
startAnimation(2068);
actionTimer = 4;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecialDelay -= 3;
}
}

item.title: Spec help! need 1337 leet help! someone good plz!
item.dc:creator: @latin_king latin king
item.description:
@latin_king wrote:

plz can you tell me what i need to do to make my d claw spec hit 4 times? im having allot of trouble, here’s the code tat has the spec

public void DClawSpec() { if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664) { setAnimation(2068); actionTimer = 4; SpecDamgNPC(34); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 4; resetAnimation(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; SpecDamgNPC(34); SpecialDelay -= 3; } else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664) { int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; 
        SpecDamg(34);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        startAnimation(2068);
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 3;
    }
}</blockquote>

if there’s anything i need to do plz help me!

Read full topic
